'''''GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 "Melodies of an Endless Journey"''''' is the CD recording of [[Genshin Concert/2021 Melodies of an Endless Journey|GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 "Melodies of an Endless Journey"]], contained in the Genshin Impact Online Concert Gift Box. It was released on January 22, 2022. The concert features musicians from the United States, Belgium, and South Korea playing covers of [[Genshin Impact]]'s [[Soundtrack]].

The Genshin Impact Online Concert Gift Box also contains sheet music of ''[[Genshin Impact Main Theme]]'', ''[[Mondstadt (Full Concert Version)|Mondstadt]]'', ''[[Liyue (Soundtrack)|Liyue]]'', and ''[[Inazuma (Soundtrack)|Inazuma]]'', as well as bordered posters, postcards, and metal badges.
